meanings.definition: A small metal disc used for counting or as a token in gambling.
meanings.sent1: I found some shiny jetons on the floor of the casino.
meanings.sent2: The players exchanged jetons for chips at the poker table.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a jeton out of my ear during his trick.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright jeton in the dull room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the jetons clinking together was music to his ears.

meanings.sent1: He jetons the ball across the field with great strength.
meanings.sent2: She jetons the paper airplane into the air and watched it soar.
meanings.sent3: The chef jetons the ingredients into the pot to start cooking.
meanings.sent4: The wind jetons the leaves off the trees in a swirling dance.
meanings.sent5: The pitcher jetons the baseball with incredible speed towards home plate.
